img_above_text:
![Furnace Valley Walkthrough \(80\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/22/Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough_%2880%29.png)
Go left first and tackle the Bull Soldier, then look underneath the first curved portion of the bridge to absorb a green Wisp.
img_below_text:
Continue on the path to the left (running alongside the wall) to pick up the Fire Date from the tree on the right and take out the Bull Stalwart.
![Furnace Valley Walkthrough \(74\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ec/Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough_%2874%29.png)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Furnace Valley Walkthrough \(80\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/22/Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough_%2880%29.png)
Go left first and tackle the Bull Soldier, then look underneath the first curved portion of the bridge to absorb a green Wisp."
        - Following Text: "Continue on the path to the left (running alongside the wall) to pick up the Fire Date from the tree on the right and take out the Bull Stalwart.
![Furnace Valley Walkthrough \(74\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ec/Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough_%2874%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a fiery, lava-filled cavern with a player character advancing toward a Bull Soldier enemy. A red arrow highlights a green Wisp located underneath a curved portion of the bridge in the background, indicating an interactable or collectible item. This scene aligns with the walkthrough's guidance to defeat the Bull Soldier and absorb the green Wisp before continuing further into Furnace Valley.
